name: git-clone-mirror-vsts-task
description: A straightforward cross-platform utility to mirror a Git repository to another location
author: Travis Kosarek

inputs.name: sourceGitRepositoryUri
inputs.label: Source Git Repository
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL of a Git repository to be used as the mirror's source. The default value of '$(Build.Repository.Uri)' will use the VSTS repository connected to this build. Example: https://github.com/traviskosarek/traviskosarek-com.git

inputs.name: sourceGitRepositoryPersonalAccessToken
inputs.label: Source Repository - Personal Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: A Personal Access token that grants access to pull to a Git repository

inputs.name: destinationGitRepositoryUri
inputs.label: Destination Git Repository
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL of a Git repository to be used as the mirror destination. Example: https://github.com/traviskosarek/traviskosarek-com.git

inputs.name: destinationGitRepositoryPersonalAccessToken
inputs.label: Destination Repository - Personal Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: A Personal Access token that grants access to push to a Git repository
